title: test_cudnn_weight_format nondeterministically fails when run with pytest
body_html:
To reproduce, install pytest and run: pytest test/test_nn.py -k cudnn

You will get:

test/test_nn.py:2483: 
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _
test/common.py:245: in assertEqual
    super(TestCase, self).assertLessEqual(abs(x - y), prec, message)
E   AssertionError: 1 not less than or equal to 1e-05 :

 test/test_nn.py ⨯✓                                                         100% ██████████
==================================== warnings summary =====================================
test/test_nn.py
  cannot collect 'test' because it is not a function.

test/test_nn.py::TestBase
  cannot collect test class 'TestBase' because it has a __init__ constructor

-- Docs: http://doc.pytest.org/en/latest/warnings.html
================================== 655 tests deselected ===================================

Results (16.94s):
       7 passed
       1 failed
         - test/test_nn.py:2450 TestNN.test_cudnn_weight_format
     655 deselected

This failure does not happen when you run only this test.

body:
To reproduce, install pytest and run: `pytest test/test_nn.py -k cudnn`

You will get:

```
test/test_nn.py:2483: 
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _
test/common.py:245: in assertEqual
    super(TestCase, self).assertLessEqual(abs(x - y), prec, message)
E   AssertionError: 1 not less than or equal to 1e-05 :

 test/test_nn.py ⨯✓                                                         100% ██████████
==================================== warnings summary =====================================
test/test_nn.py
  cannot collect 'test' because it is not a function.

test/test_nn.py::TestBase
  cannot collect test class 'TestBase' because it has a __init__ constructor

-- Docs: http://doc.pytest.org/en/latest/warnings.html
================================== 655 tests deselected ===================================

Results (16.94s):
       7 passed
       1 failed
         - test/test_nn.py:2450 TestNN.test_cudnn_weight_format
     655 deselected
```

This failure does not happen when you run only this test.
